name: HFH Tactics: Elite Sponsorship
description:
With ELITE Sponsorship:

  • Get access to use the ELITE Shop.
  • Get access to ELITE Achievement Avatars.
  • Get access to Exclusive Missions.
  • You can send more donations.
  • You get a 750 Meta Crystal bonus now.

    • *You get (15x your level) of Crystals each month. *Meta Crystals can always be earned in game and no purchase is required.

    *You will have get an access code with your order. Use your code in the shop to activate your access.
